name: veez userbot
description: a telegram userbot based on pyrogram and telethon

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

MONGO_URI.description: this is needed for database account, get from mongodb.com

PYROGRAM_SESSION.description: Pyrogram String Session, Get it by Running python3 -m session

TELETHON_SESSION.description: Telethon String Session, Get it by Running python3 -m session

LOG_CHAT.description: make a public/private group, generate the id and fill in here,

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: enter the app name you fill in top first.

HEROKU_API.description: enter your heroku api key, find at https://dashboard.heroku.com/account
